together we save the auto industry

so thanks to the grip and the resilience

it this same that everybody knows you

hand college has never been more

the average tuition at a public

and meanwhile not enough colleges have

becomes hard to start a business if you

as what was happening was the old system

we've made college more affordable for

through tax credits and grants and

so that that's all a good start but it's

that's just the truth colleges are not

we can't go about business as usual

for years higher education is still the

so whether we're talking about a

we're going to be partnering with

and I've got confidence
I have confidence that our country's

my plan comes down to three main goals
first we're going to start raiding

number two we're going to jump start new

is we're going to make sure that if you

so let me just talk about each of these

making sure that families and taxpayers

we are going to deliver on a promise I

we're gonna deliver on a promise we made
